Class PointD

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.android.PointD

  • public class PointD
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing pairs of double values.

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
